title: varuvaanO vannakkuyilE
sahitya:
varuvAnO vana kuyilE naTarAjan varuvAnO vana kuyilE



(varuvAnO)







anupallavi







tiruvOngum tillaiyil cinmaya natam sheyyum dEvAdi dEvan ennuL



sEvadi vaittADa 



(varuvAnO)







caraNam 1







bhangap-paTTuppaTTun pAdattai nADinEn pArinil unaiyanri Or



tuNai vErillEn



engE nI irukkirAi enrE nAn kadaravum ingE nAn irukkirEn enrE



maraindavan 



(varuvAnO)







caraNam 2







aruNOdayam pOlE azhagan kuzhagan en Aruyirk-kuyirAna sUriyan



pUraNan



karuNai mukham kATTik-kavalaippaDAdE enru kaNNIr tuDaikkumen



kaNNAn mukkaNNan 



(varuvAnO)
